Question: In February 1954, this person appeared in a screen test with James Dean, directed by Gjon Mili, for East of Eden (1955).
Hints: This person lobbied the Connecticut governor for funds for the 2011 Aspetuck Land Trust in Easton.
This person was testing for the role of Aron Trask, Dean for the role of Aron's fraternal twin brother Cal.
This person died on September 26, 2008, aged 83, surrounded by his family and close friends.
